component.name: NavigationList
component.script:
sub init() m.top.overhangTitle = "ROKU SP Demo" m.top.panelSize = "narrow" m.top.focusable = true m.top.hasNextPanel = true m.top.isFullScreen = true m.top.leftOnly = true m.top.createNextPanelOnItemFocus = false m.top.selectButtonMovesPanelForward = true
m.top.list = m.top.findNode("navigationLabelList") navItems = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode") privacyManagerNode = navItems.createChild("ContentNode") privacyManagerNode.setField("title", "Privacy Manager") homeNode = navItems.createChild("ContentNode") homeNode.setField("title", "Home") sec = CreateObject("roRegistrySection", "Authentication") if sec.exists("loggedInUser") signOutNode = navItems.createChild("ContentNode") signOutNode.setField("title", "Sign-Out") else signInNode = navItems.createChild("ContentNode") signInNode.setField("title", "Sign-In") end if m.top.list.content = navItems end sub
